description: Dashbord works with postgres_exporter for prometheus

panels.description: Instance current status.
panels.title: Instance

panels.description: Instance start time.
panels.title: Start Time

panels.description: Synchronous state of standby server.
panels.title: Replica state

panels.description: Total number of sequential scans initiated for tables in database.
panels.title: Seq

panels.description: Total number of index scans initiated for tables in database.
panels.title: Ind

panels.description: Time of the most recent failed archival operation.
panels.title: Archive Fails

panels.description: Total WAL files size.
panels.title: WAL Size

panels.description: Total WAL files rate.
panels.title: WAL Rate

panels.description: The number of backends connected to a certain database
panels.title: Number of backends

panels.description: Number of deadlocks per logical database.
panels.title: Deadlocks

panels.description: Number of transactions in this database that have been committed per second.
panels.title: TPS

panels.description: Number of queries per second.
panels.title: QPS

panels.description: Replication lag behind master in seconds.
panels.title: Replay Lag

panels.description: The percentage of transaction ID space used out. Maximum TXID assumed as 2000000000.
panels.title: TXID

panels.description: Oldest XID for database instance.
panels.title: Oldest XID

panels.description: Largest database age.
panels.title: Database age

panels.description: Archived WALs per second.
panels.title: WAL Archived

panels.description: WAL files count.
panels.title: WAL Files

panels.description: Shows the number of connections per database.

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM /pg.common.connection_by_database.*/ WHERE namespace='$namespace' and $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(previous)

panels.title: Connection by database

panels.description: Shows how many connections are in use right now. It shows max connections, used connections, reserved for regular, and superuser.

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM /pg.common.connection_count_stat.*/ WHERE namespace='$namespace' and $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(previous)

panels.title: Overall connection statistic

panels.description: Shows the number of not idle connections per database.

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM /pg.common.count_not_idle.*/ WHERE namespace='$namespace' and $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(previous)

panels.title: Not idle connections by Database

panels.description: This table shows number of Active Connections in current moment by role. Also shows Connection Limits that is set during Role create. Also, shows not idle connection by role.

targets.query: SELECT top("$column", $limit) as "$column", "short_query", "datname", "mean_time", "queryid" FROM (SELECT LAST("queryid_val"), * FROM "ma.pg.common.queries_stat" WHERE $timeFilter and ("datname" = '$datname' OR 'All' = '$datname' ) and "namespace" = '$namespace'  GROUP BY "queryid" ORDER BY DESC LIMIT 1) ORDER BY DESC

panels.title: Number of Active Connections by Role

targets.expr: sum by (state) (pg_stat_act_cnt{datname=~"$datname", namespace="$namespace", backend_type="client backend",state=~"idle|idle in transaction|idle in transaction (aborted)|active", cluster=~"$cluster"})
sum(pg_stat_act_cnt{datname=~"$datname", namespace="$namespace", backend_type!="client backend",state=~"idle|idle in transaction|idle in transaction (aborted)|active", cluster=~"$cluster"})

panels.description: Idle process seconds Heatmap
panels.title: Idle process seconds

targets.expr: sum(pg_stat_act_cnt{datname=~"$datname", namespace="$namespace", backend_type!="client backend",state=~"idle|idle in transaction|idle in transaction (aborted)|active", cluster=~"$cluster"}) by (backend_type)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  current_timestamp AS "time",
  event_type AS metric,
  count(ps.pid) AS value
FROM pg_wait_sampling_current pw, pg_stat_activity ps
where ps.pid=pw.pid and state = 'active'
group by current_timestamp,
event_type

panels.description: Top 5 tables with higher amount of dead tuples

targets.expr: topk(5, sort_desc(sum by (datname, relname, size) (pg_dead_tuple_percent{namespace="$namespace", cluster=~"$cluster", datname=~"$datname"})))

panels.title: Dead tuples

panels.description: Rate at which IO performed on buffers

Total amount of data written to temporary files by queries in this database. All temporary files are counted, regardless of why the temporary file was created, and regardless of the log_temp_files setting.
Sessions Blocking other session running simultaneously  in the database servers

targets.expr: sum by (blocked_user, blocked_pid, blocking_pid, blocking_user, mode) (pg_sess_rownum{namespace="$namespace", cluster=~"$cluster"})

panels.title: Blocking Session Details

targets.expr:
sum by (datname,schemaname,table_name,namespace) (pg_statio_user_tables_from_disk{namespace="$namespace", datname=~"$datname", cluster=~"$cluster"}) * ${grouping:value} or on (namespace, datname)
sum by (datname,schemaname,table_name,namespace) (pg_statio_user_tables_from_disk{namespace="$namespace", datname=~"$datname", cluster=~"$cluster"})

sum by (datname,schemaname,table_name,namespace) (pg_statio_user_tables_disk_hits_perc{namespace="$namespace", datname=~"$datname", cluster=~"$cluster"}) * ${grouping:value} or on (namespace, datname)
sum by (datname,schemaname,table_name,namespace) (pg_statio_user_tables_disk_hits_perc{namespace="$namespace", datname=~"$datname", cluster=~"$cluster"})

sum by (datname,schemaname,table_name,namespace) (pg_statio_user_tables_cache_hits_perc{namespace="$namespace", datname=~"$datname", cluster=~"$cluster"}) * ${grouping:value} or on (namespace, datname)
sum by (datname,schemaname,table_name,namespace) (pg_statio_user_tables_cache_hits_perc{namespace="$namespace", datname=~"$datname", cluster=~"$cluster"})

sum by (datname,schemaname,table_name,namespace) (pg_statio_user_tables_total_hits{namespace="$namespace", datname=~"$datname", cluster=~"$cluster"}) * ${grouping:value} or on (namespace, datname)
sum by (datname,schemaname,table_name,namespace) (pg_statio_user_tables_total_hits{namespace="$namespace", datname=~"$datname", cluster=~"$cluster"})

panels.description: The table shows locks by table

targets.query: SELECT top("$column", $limit) as "$column", "short_query", "datname", "mean_time", "queryid" FROM (SELECT LAST("queryid_val"), * FROM "ma.pg.common.queries_stat" WHERE $timeFilter and ("datname" = '$datname' OR 'All' = '$datname' ) and "namespace" = '$namespace'  GROUP BY "queryid" ORDER BY DESC LIMIT 1) ORDER BY DESC

panels.title: Lock Tree Monitor

panels.description: Describes information about replication slots
panels.title: Replication Slots Graph

panels.description: Describes information about replication slots

targets.query: SELECT top("$column", $limit) as "$column", "short_query", "datname", "mean_time", "queryid" FROM (SELECT LAST("queryid_val"), * FROM "ma.pg.common.queries_stat" WHERE $timeFilter and ("datname" = '$datname' OR 'All' = '$datname' ) and "namespace" = '$namespace'  GROUP BY "queryid" ORDER BY DESC LIMIT 1) ORDER BY DESC

panels.title: Replication Slots

targets.expr:
sum by (datname, query, rolname, queryid, namespace) (pg_stat_query_shared_blks_read{namespace="$namespace", datname=~"$datname", cluster=~"$cluster"}) * ${grouping:value} or on (namespace, datname)
sum by (datname, query, rolname, queryid, namespace) (pg_stat_query_shared_blks_read{namespace="$namespace", datname=~"$datname", cluster=~"$cluster"})

sum by (datname, query, rolname, queryid) (pg_stat_query_shared_blks_written{namespace="$namespace", datname=~"$datname", cluster=~"$cluster"}) * ${grouping:value} or on (namespace, datname)
sum by (datname, query, rolname, queryid) (pg_stat_query_shared_blks_written{namespace="$namespace", datname=~"$datname", cluster=~"$cluster"})

panels.title: Avg Active sessions Waiting By SQLs

targets.expr:
sum by (datname, pid, query, state, username, xact_runtime, namespace) (pg_stat_vacuum_rownum{datname=~"$datname", namespace="$namespace", cluster=~"$cluster"}) * ${grouping:value} or on (namespace, datname)
sum by (datname, pid, query, state, username, xact_runtime, namespace) (pg_stat_vacuum_rownum{datname=~"$datname", namespace="$namespace", cluster=~"$cluster"})

((pg_progress_vacuum_phase{namespace="$namespace",datname="$datname",relname="$table", cluster=~"$cluster"}== bool 2) or (pg_progress_vacuum_phase{namespace="$namespace",datname="$datname",relname="$table", cluster=~"$cluster"}== bool 4) ) * (pg_progress_vacuum_max_dead_tuples{namespace="$namespace",datname="$datname",relname="$table", cluster=~"$cluster"})

((pg_progress_vacuum_phase{namespace="$namespace",datname="$datname",relname="$table", cluster=~"$cluster"}== bool 2) or (pg_progress_vacuum_phase{namespace="$namespace",datname="$datname",relname="$table", cluster=~"$cluster"}== bool 4) )* (pg_progress_vacuum_num_dead_tuples{namespace="$namespace",datname="$datname",relname="$table", cluster=~"$cluster"})
sum by(wait_event_type)(avg by (query,wait_event_type) (pg_pash_avg_active_sess{backend_type="client backend" , namespace="$namespace", cluster=~"$cluster"}))

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  ash_time AS "time",
  total_time
FROM pg_stat_statements_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ash_time)
ORDER BY 1

targets.expr: sum by(wait_event_type)(avg by (query,wait_event_type) (pg_pash_avg_active_sess{backend_type="client backend", namespace="$namespace", cluster=~"$cluster"}))/scalar(sum(pg_stat_act_cnt{datname=~"$datname", namespace="$namespace", backend_type="client backend",state=~"idle in transaction|active", cluster=~"$cluster"}))
sum by (datname, db_namespace, microservice, tenant_id) (pg_dbaas_name{namespace="$namespace", cluster=~"$cluster"})

current.value: on (namespace, datname) group_left(microservice, db_namespace) sum by (namespace,datname,microservice,db_namespace) (pg_dbaas_name)

list.label: Grouping
list.name: grouping

options.value: on (namespace, datname) group_left(microservice, db_namespace) sum by (namespace,datname,microservice,db_namespace) (pg_dbaas_name)
on (namespace, datname) group_left(microservice, db_namespace) sum by (namespace,datname,microservice,db_namespace) (pg_dbaas_name)
on (namespace, datname) group_left(microservice, db_namespace) sum by (namespace,datname,microservice,db_namespace) (pg_dbaas_name)

list.query: {{datname}} : 1, {{db_namespace}}|{{microservice}}|{{datname}} : on (namespace\, datname) group_left(microservice\, db_namespace) sum by (namespace\,datname\,microservice\,db_namespace) (pg_dbaas_name), {{db_namespace}}|{{microservice}} : on (namespace\, datname) group_left(microservice\, db_namespace) sum by (namespace\,datname\,microservice\,db_namespace) (pg_dbaas_name), {{microservice}} : on (namespace\, datname) group_left(microservice\, db_namespace) sum by (namespace\,datname\,microservice\,db_namespace) (pg_dbaas_name)

title: Postgres Exporter
